title: how is the 401 HWY going to connect with rest of Hwys
text:
I'll need some more information before we can attempt to answer your
question. I assume you're referring to U.S. 401 near Fuqay-Varina or
Raleigh? Or is there another stretch of the highway you're referring
to? Just looking at the map, it appears to connect to I-40 just south
of Raleigh.
